page.title: 14Birchwood High School
page.content: The High School opened in September 1985 with 170 children,15 teachers and 18 ancillary workers.New subjects taught are computor studies and technology.The school has its own video camera,and 14 computors. Once a week the whole school as leisure activity sessions,the children can choose,for example, from activities like indoor bowls,Casio playing,model making,table tennis, Aero club,and an Electronic Newspaper.Birchwood High School has unique sports facilities. One pitch has the revolutionary Astroturf,an artificial all-weather surface.They also have a full-size flood-lit football pitch which has its own irrigation system.All pitches have been seeded differently and have different methods of drainage.The National Sports Council is monitoring the pitches for the next 5 years.
